title: We Are the Champions (Raw Sessions Version)
lyrics:
[Intro: Freddie Mercury, 
Mike Stone
]
1, 2, 3
Haha
See I'm trying to sing it in time because it goes da na na na
This'll be take 37,000
[Verse 1]
I've paid my dues
Time after time
I've done my sentence
But committed no crime
And bad mistakes
I've made a few
I've had my share of sand kicked in my face
But I've come through
(And I need to go on and on, and on, and on)
[Chorus]
We are the champions, my friends
And we'll keep on fighting 'til the end
We are the champions
We are the champions
No time for losers
'Cause we are the champions
Of the world

[Verse 2]
I've taken my bows
And my curtain calls
You brought me fame and fortune and everything that goes with it
I thank you all
But it's been no bed of roses
No pleasure cruise
I consider it a challenge before the whole human race
And I ain't gonna lose
(And I need to go on and on, and on, and on)
[Chorus]
We are the champions, my friends
And we'll keep on fighting 'til the end
We are the champions
We are the champions
No time for losers
'Cause we are the champions
Of the world
[Chorus]
We are the champions, my friends
And we'll keep on fighting 'til the end
Yes, we are the champions
We are the champions
No time for losers
'Cause we are the champions
Of the world

[Guitar Solo]
We are the champions
We are the champions
(Ooh)
We are the champions
[Outro: Freddie Mercury]
That was a lovely feel (It was)
That's exactly how it should be
